iWant: it to be able to suggest many different career paths and give me accurate descriptions of what they look like in real life - e.g. the daily life when I work as a xxx
soThat: I don't get stereotypical career suggestions based on my gender/current education/hobbies, and end up pursuing a career that doesn't suit me later in life
because: I am young and unsure about my interests and values, so I don't want to miss out on possibilities
desirable: board recommendations not only based on existing job profiles/roles/stereotypes, that I can then narrow down myself
acceptable: recommendations based on provided data, but also explains why options were included/excluded
dealBreakers: excluding options based on current profile/background, demographic data

values.explanation: the chatbot requires a lot of trust
excludes job opportunities potentially threatening to financial safety
I'm able to make informed decisions
you can decide whether to exclude a job offering
chat bot argues why jobs are excluded/included
I consider the options without the chatbot's intereferance relying on my own creativity
You choose what information to give to the chatbot
